analyzed: zhag thig les brgyan/_/bde mchog 'byung gnas dpal ldan lha mo bstod/_/
translated: Adorned with the seal of the day, I praise the glorious goddess, the source of supreme bliss.üîΩI praise the goddess who has three eyes, unobstructed in the three

translated: kƒÅyas, and swift as lightning, who protects the three realms,üîΩwearing a black silk cloak and a garment of patchwork cloth.

analyzed: nag ko rlon can/_/re lde'i na bza' ldan pa'i lha mo bstod/_/tshhad med phyag

analyzed: bzhi thod khrag mtshhon cha'i tshhogs/_/rnam thar bzhi'i rang bzhin bsnams par
translated: and who embodies the four aspects of perfect freedom,

analyzed: mdzad/_/bsdu dngos rnam bzhis srid na rgyun mi 'chad/_/pha rol phyin drug
translated: and who, through the four means of gathering disciples, is uninterrupted in existence,üîΩand who is adorned with the ornaments of the six perfections.

original: rgyan ldan lha mo bstod/_/srid pa'i mtshho skems ye shes me dpung 'bar/_/ma
analyzed: rgyan ldan lha mo bstod/_/srid pa'i mtshho skems ye shes me dpung 'bar/_/ma
translated: I praise the goddess who dries up the ocean of existence, who blazes with the fire of wisdom,üîΩwho is adorned with poisonous snakes and lions in order to tame the untameable,

original: rung 'dul phyir dug sbrul seng ges brgyan/_/gdug pa bsgral phyir khrag gi rgyaüîΩmtshhor bzhugs/_/mgo rlon do shal 'chang ba'i lha mo bstod/_/gsung

translated: who sits in the middle of a blood lake in order to liberate the vicious,üîΩand who wears a garland of human heads.üîΩI praise the goddess whose melodious speech, peaceful and wrathful, tames beings with the sound of the Dharma,

original: dbyangs zhi drag chos sgra 'gro ba 'dul/_/thugs zab mkhyen brtshes srid zhi'i
analyzed: dbyangs zhi drag chos sgra 'gro ba 'dul/_/thugs zab mkhyen brtshes srid zhi'i
translated: whose mind is profound wisdom, and who knows existence and peace.

original: dam la sgrol/_/yon tan gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum ltar 'bar/_/phrin las kun
analyzed: dam la sgrol/_/yon tan gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum ltar 'bar/_/phrin las kun
translated: You are bound by oath, and your qualities blaze with the splendor of a hundred thousand suns.üîΩYou accomplish all activities. I praise glorious Goddess.

original: 'grub dpal ldan lha mo bstod/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos dpal ldan bla ma yi/_/
analyzed: 'grub dpal ldan lha mo bstod/_/sangs rgyas kun dngos dpal ldan bla ma yi/_/
translated: The glorious guru, who is the embodiment of all buddhas,üîΩmay you cause the glory and wealth of his teachings to spread in all directions,

original: bstan pa dpal 'byor kun nas rgyas pa yis/_/'gro kun theg mchog lam la
analyzed: bstan pa dpal 'byor kun nas rgyas pa yis/_/'gro kun theg mchog lam la
translated: may you cause all beings to enter the path of the supreme vehicle,

original: 'god pa dang /_/bsgrub po don gnyis bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/dpal
analyzed: 'god pa dang /_/bsgrub po don gnyis bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/dpal
translated: and may you perform the activity of accomplishing the two goals of the practitioner.

original: ldan lha mo la a b+ha yas zhal gzigs dus bstod pa/_pan+di ta shra ta ka ra warma
analyzed: ldan lha mo la a b+ha yas zhal gzigs dus bstod pa/_pan+di ta shra ta ka ra warma
translated: This praise of the glorious Goddess was composed by Abhayakaragupta when he had a vision of the Goddess.

analyzed: dang /_gu ru ba yon tan shi las gu ge tho ling du bsgyur ba'o//_//

analyzed: dpal lha mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba
